abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Additional
            Financing (AF) for the E-Sri Lanka Development Project is to
            assist the Borrower in promoting the use of information and
            communication technology to: (i) generate growth, employment
            and equity; (ii) provide affordable access to means of
            information and communication, including access by citizens
            and businesses to public information and services online;
            and (iii) encourage and enhance the competitiveness of
            industries, small and medium enterprises and other private
            sector entities. The AF entail the following changes: (i)
            changes in the project development objective) PDO
            intermediate outcome indicators and results framework, (ii)
            changes in the project components, and, in addition, in
            order to implement the scale up activities, the closing date
            for the original project and additional financing will be
            extended until December 31, 2013.
